contentrichtext.text: {{Portal|Catholicism}} {{distinguish|Bernardo O'Higgins}} '''Bernard O'Higgins''' (?–1564) was an [[Irish people|Irish]] [[Roman Catholic Church|Roman Catholic]] bishop. He served as the [[Bishop of Elphin]] from 1542 to 1564.<ref>[http://www.catholic-hierarchy.org/bishop/bohig.html Bishop Bernard O'Higgins], Catholic Hierarchy website, Retrieved 30 August 2011.</ref> ==References== {{Reflist}} {{S-start}} {{S-rel|ca}} {{Succession box | before = | title = [[Bishop of Elphin]] | years = 1542–1564 | after = [[Dominic Burke (bishop)]] }} {{End}} {{Persondata <!-- Metadata: see [[Wikipedia:Persondata]]. --> | NAME = OHiggins, Bernard | ALTERNATIVE NAMES = | SHORT DESCRIPTION =Bishop of Elphin | DATE OF BIRTH = | PLACE OF BIRTH = | DATE OF DEATH = 1564 | PLACE OF DEATH = }} {{DEFAULTSORT:OHiggins, Bernard}} [[Category:1564 deaths]] [[Category:Roman Catholic bishops of Elphin]] [[Category:Year of birth unknown]] {{Ireland-RC-archbishop-stub}}
